text.div:
Telecommunication Expiration Reason

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
C CorrectedThe telecommunication address has been replaced with a corrected version.added v2.6
E Added in errorThe telecommunication address was incorrect and should never have been associated with the individual.added v2.6
M MovedThe individual associated with the telecommunication address has moved and is no longer reachable at the address.added v2.6
N No longer in serviceThe telecommunication address is no longer connected or availableadded v2.6
R On requestThe associated individual requested that the telecommunication address be removed from their record (though it may still be correct).added v2.6

name: v2.0868
title: v2 Telecommunication expiration reason
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0868 ( Telecommunication expiration reason)

extension.valueString: The telecommunication address has been replaced with a corrected version.
The telecommunication address was incorrect and should never have been associated with the individual.
The individual associated with the telecommunication address has moved and is no longer reachable at the address.
The telecommunication address is no longer connected or available
The associated individual requested that the telecommunication address be removed from their record (though it may still be correct).
